-| diffsc(s2, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, ctopon)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, ct0), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
-| diffsc(s2, c1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s2, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: The predicate "is a T_0 space". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)
